description.english: Skip the title screen.
description.german: Überspringe den Startbildschirm.
description.french: Passez l'écran titre.
description.italian: Salta la schermata del titolo.
description.spanish: Pasa de la pantalla del título.
description.russian: Пропустите экран с названием.
description.polish: Pomiń ekran tytułowy.
description.czech: Přeskoč hlavní obrazovku.
description.turkish: Başlangıç ekranını geç.
description.brazilian: Pule a tela de título.
description.japanese: タイトル画面をスキップ
description.tchinese: 跳過標題畫面。
description.schinese: 跳过标题画面。

description.english: Complete flight training by finishing the Kindergarten mission.
description.german: Schließe das Flugtraining durch Beenden der Mission "Kindergarten" ab.
description.french: Allez jusqu'au bout de l'entraînement au pilotage en terminant la mission La Maternelle.
description.italian: Devi completare l'addestramento di volo terminando la missione Kindergarten.
description.spanish: Completa el entrenamiento de vuelo terminando la misión «Jardín de infancia».
description.russian: Пройдите обучение, завершив задание «Детский сад».
description.polish: Ukończ lot szkoleniowy, przechodząc misję „Zerówka”.
description.czech: Splň misi Školička, a dokonči tak letecký výcvik. Nespadni!
description.turkish: Uçuş eğitimini Anaokul görevini bitirerek tamamla.
description.brazilian: Termine a missão Jardim de Infância para completar o treinamento de voo.
description.japanese: キンダーガーテンでの飛行訓練を終える
description.tchinese: 通過玩通幼兒園戰鬥任務完成飛行訓練。
description.schinese: 通过玩通幼儿园战斗任务完成飞行训练。

displayName.tchinese: 曆史課上沒教過你的東西
displayName.schinese: 历史课上没教过的东西

description.english: Read the campaign prologue.
description.german: Lies den Prolog der Kampagne.
description.french: Lisez le prologue de la campagne.
description.italian: Devi leggere il prologo della campagna.
description.spanish: Lee el prólogo de la campaña.
description.russian: Прочтите пролог кампании.
description.polish: Przeczytaj prolog kampanii.
description.czech: Přečti si prolog kampaně.
description.turkish: Harekat öncesi giriş bölümünü oku.
description.brazilian: Leia o prólogo da campanha.
description.japanese: キャンペーンのプロローグを読もう
description.tchinese: 閱讀戰鬥序言。
description.schinese: 阅读战斗序言。

displayName.italian: Solo il cielo come limite... per 90 minuti
displayName.spanish: El límite es el cielo, noventa minutos
displayName.brazilian: O Céu é o Limite, Noventa Minutos

description.english: Play online for at least 90 minutes.
description.german: Spiele mindestens 90 Minuten online.
description.french: Jouez en ligne pendant un minimum de 90 minutes.
description.italian: Devi giocare online per almeno 90 minuti.
description.spanish: Juega online durante al menos 90 minutos.
description.russian: Проведите 90 минут в сетевых баталиях.
description.polish: Graj online przynajmniej przez 90 minut.
description.czech: Hraj online alespoň 90 minut.
description.turkish: En az 90 dakika boyunca çevrimiçi muharebelerde savaş.
description.brazilian: Jogue online por pelo menos 90 minutos
description.japanese: 最低90分間オンラインモードでプレイする
description.tchinese: 在線遊戲至少90分鍾。
description.schinese: 在线游戏至少90分钟。

displayName.japanese: 真の格闘戦パイロット

description.english: Score 5 kills in a multiplayer battle.
description.german: Erziele 5 Abschüsse in einem Mehrspielerkampf.
description.french: Abattez 5 adversaires dans une bataille multijoueur.
description.italian: Devi realizzare 5 uccisioni in una battaglia multigiocatore.
description.spanish: Causa 5 bajas en una batalla multijugador.
description.russian: Сбейте 5 противников в сетевой игре.
description.polish: Zalicz 5 zestrzeleń w walce wieloosobowej.
description.czech: Dosáhni 5 sestřelů v bitvě více hráčů.
description.turkish: Bir çoklu oyuncu muharebesinde 5 düşman öldür.
description.brazilian: Realize 5 abates em uma batalha do multijogador.
description.japanese: オンライン対戦でキル数を5稼ぐ
description.tchinese: 在多人遊戲戰鬥中殲敵5人得分。
description.schinese: 在多人游戏战斗中歼敌5人得分。

description.english: Score 25 kills in a multiplayer battle.
description.german: Erziele 25 Abschüsse in einem Mehrspielerkampf.
description.french: Abattez 25 adversaires dans une bataille multijoueur.
description.italian: Devi realizzare 25 uccisioni in una battaglia multigiocatore.
description.spanish: Causa 25 bajas en una batalla multijugador.
description.russian: Сбейте 25 противников в сетевой игре.
description.polish: Zalicz 25 zestrzeleń w walce wieloosobowej.
description.czech: Dosáhni 25 sestřelů v bitvě více hráčů.
description.turkish: Bir çoklu oyuncu muharebesinde 25 düşman öldür.
description.brazilian: Realize 25 abates em uma batalha do multijogador.
description.japanese: オンライン対戦でキル数を25稼ぐ
description.tchinese: 在多人遊戲戰鬥中殲敵25人得分。
description.schinese: 在多人游戏战斗中歼敌25人得分。

description.english: Strafe or bomb at least 100 enemy soldiers.
description.german: Beschieße oder bombardiere mindestens 100 feindliche Soldaten.
description.french: Mitraillez ou bombardez au moins 100 soldats ennemis.
description.italian: Devi colpire o bombardare almeno 100 soldati nemici.
description.spanish: Acribilla o bombardea al menos 100 soldados enemigos.
description.russian: Расстреляйте или разбомбите 100 солдат врага.
description.polish: Ostrzelaj lub zbombarduj przynajmniej 100 żołnierzy wroga.
description.czech: Odstřel nebo vybombarduj alespoň 100 nepřátelských vojáků.
description.turkish: En az 100 düşman askerini makineli tüfek veya bomba ile öldür.
description.brazilian: Bombardeie pelo menos 100 soldados inimigos.
description.japanese: 最低でも100人の敵兵士を機銃掃射か爆撃で倒す
description.tchinese: 轟炸至少9100名敵軍士兵。
description.schinese: 轰炸至少100名敌军士兵。

description.english: Bounce a flight of “Sally” bombers in the Raid on Rangoon mission.
description.german: Schlage das Geschwader Sally-Bomber in der Mission "Überfall auf Rangun" zurück.
description.french: Repoussez une escadrille de bombardiers Sally au cours de la mission Raid sur Rangoon.
description.italian: Devi respingere una squadriglia di bombardieri "Sally" nella missione Raid su Rangoon.
description.spanish: Repele una escuadrilla de bombarderos «Sally» en la misión «Asalto a Rangún».
description.russian: Отразите атаку бомбардировщиков в задании «Налет на Рангун».
description.polish: Odstrasz eskadrę bombowców “Sally” w misji „Nalot na Rangun”.
description.czech: Odraz letku bombardérů „Sally“ v misi Nálet na Rangún.
description.turkish: Rangoon'a hava saldırısı harekat görevinde Japon bombardıman uçaklarını savuştur.
description.brazilian: Destrua os bombardeiros "Sally" na missão Ataque em Rangum.
description.japanese: ランゴンを空襲する
description.tchinese: 在突襲仰光的任務中擊退『薩利』轟炸機。
description.schinese: 在突袭仰光的任务中击退“萨利”轰炸机。

description.english: Escape across Bay of Bengal in the Lucky Day Akyab mission.
description.german: Zieh dich über die Bucht von Bengalen in der Mission "Glückstag über Akjab" zurück.
description.french: Repliez-vous de l'autre côté du golfe du Bengale dans la mission Coup de chance à Akyab.
description.italian: Devi ritirarti attraverso il Golfo del Bengala nella missione Fortuna ad Aykab.
description.spanish: Escapa por la bahía de Bengala en la misión «Día de suerte en Akyab».
description.russian: Отступите через Бенгальский залив в задании «Удачный день для Акьяба».
description.polish: Ucieknij przez Zatokę Bengalską podczas misji „Szczęśliwy dzień w Akyab”.
description.czech: Uleť přes Bengálský záliv v misi Šťastný den v Akyabu.
description.turkish: Akyab'da Şanslı Gün görevinde Bengal Körfezi boyunca düşman uçaklarından kaç.
description.brazilian: Fuja através do Golfo de Bengala na missão Dia de Sorte em Akyab.
description.japanese: アキャブの吉日でベネガル湾を逃げる
description.tchinese: 在幸運日阿恰布任務中逃離孟加拉灣。
description.schinese: 在幸运日阿恰布任务中逃离孟加拉湾。

description.english: Complete the Final Flight mission.
description.german: Schließe die Mission "Der letzte Flug" ab.
description.french: Réussissez la mission Dernier vol.
description.italian: Devi completare la missione L'ultimo volo.
description.spanish: Completa la misión «Vuelo final».
description.russian: Завершите задание «Последний полет» в кампании.
description.polish: Ukończ misję „Ostatni lot”.
description.czech: Dokonči misi Poslední let.
description.turkish: Son Uçuş görevini tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete a missão Voo Final.
description.japanese: 最後の戦いで日本のエースを倒す
description.tchinese: 完成最後的飛行任務。
description.schinese: 完成最后的飞行任务。

description.english: Complete the campaign.
description.german: Schließe die Kampagne ab.
description.french: Terminez la campagne.
description.italian: Devi completare la campagna.
description.spanish: Completa la campaña.
description.russian: Вы завершили все задания кампании.
description.polish: Ukończ kampanię.
description.czech: Dokonči kampaň.
description.turkish: Harekat görevlerini tamamla.
description.brazilian: Conclua a campanha.
description.japanese: キャンペーンを終える
description.tchinese: 完成戰鬥。
description.schinese: 完成战斗。

description.english: Destroy an enemy aircraft while diving from high altitude in a P-40.
description.german: Zerstöre ein feindliches Flugzeug, während du dich aus großer Höhe mit einer P-40 herabstürzt.
description.french: Abattez un appareil ennemi en piquant sur lui depuis une haute altitude à bord d'un P-40.
description.italian: Devi distruggere un aereo nemico tuffandoti in picchiata da una quota elevata con un P-40.
description.spanish: Destruye un avión enemigo mientras desciendes desde una gran altitud en un P-40.
description.russian: Сбейте самолет врага, спикировав с большой высоты на P-40.
description.polish: Zniszcz samolot wroga, pikując z dużej wysokości w samolocie P-40.
description.czech: Znič nepřátelský letoun při letu z výšky v P-40.
description.turkish: Bir P-40 ile yüksek irtifadan dalış yaparken bir düşman uçağını imha et.
description.brazilian: Destrua uma aeronave inimiga enquanto mergulha de uma grande altitude em um P-40.
description.japanese: P-40で敵の飛行機を高空から急降下しながら倒せ
description.tchinese: 駕駛P-40從高空俯衝殲滅敵機。
description.schinese: 驾驶P-40从高空俯冲歼灭敌机。

description.english: Perform all arcade-maneuvers, then activate TrazerTime.
description.german: Vollführe alle Arcade-Manöver und aktiviere dann TrazerTime.
description.french: Exécutez toutes les manœuvres d'arcade, puis activez TrazerTime.
description.italian: Devi eseguire tutte le manovre Arcade, quindi attivare il TrazerTime.
description.spanish: Realiza todas las maniobras de arcade y luego activa el TrazerTime.
description.russian: Выполните все аркадные маневры, а затем включите замедление времени.
description.polish: Wykonaj wszystkie ewolucje zręcznościowe, a potem włącz CZT.
description.czech: Proveď všechny arkádové manévry a pak aktivuj Zpomalený čas.
description.turkish: Tüm manevraları gerçekleştir ve ardından TrazerTime'ı etkinleştir.
description.brazilian: Realize todas as manobras arcade, depois ative o TrazerTime.
description.japanese: 全てのアーケード機動を行い、トレーザータイムを起動せよ
description.tchinese: 執行所有街機操作，然後激活TrazerTime。
description.schinese: 执行所有街机操作，然后激活TrazerTime。

displayName.spanish: As de la captura de bandera
displayName.japanese: バトルフラッグボール

description.english: Score three “CTF” points in a FLAGBUSTERS online battle.
description.german: Erziele 3 Punkte auf der Jagd nach der gegnerischen Flagge in einem FLAGGENJÄGER-Onlinekampf.
description.french: Marquez 3 points dans une partie en ligne de CAPTURE DU DRAPEAU.
description.italian: Devi ottenere tre punti "Capture the Flag" in una battaglia online FLAGBUSTER.
description.spanish: Consigue tres puntos «CTF» en una batalla online de «Capturar la bandera».
description.russian: Заработайте три очка в сетевой битве «Охота на флаги».
description.polish: Zdobądź trzy punkty „ZA FLAGĘ” w walce online „POGROMCY FLAG”.
description.czech: Získej tři „vlajkové“ body v online bitvě Vlajkonoše.
description.turkish: BAYRAK SAVAŞI çevrimiçi muharevesinde üç "BEG" puanı al.
description.brazilian: Marque três pontos de captura em uma batalha online de LADRÕES DE BANDEIRA.
description.japanese: フラグバスターズで
description.tchinese: 奪旗高手在線戰鬥中獲得三分『奪旗』點數。
description.schinese: 在夺旗高手在线战斗中获得三分“夺旗”点数。

displayName.japanese: それがエース・マッドドックスだ！

description.english: Watch the credits roll.
description.german: Sieh dir die Liste der Mitwirkenden an.
description.french: Regardez les crédits.
description.italian: Devi guardare i riconoscimenti.
description.spanish: Ve los créditos.
description.russian: Просмотрите список создателей игры.
description.polish: Obejrzyj cały ekran „Autorzy”.
description.czech: Dokoukej titulky.
description.turkish: Emeği geçenler bölümünü izle.
description.brazilian: Veja os créditos.
description.japanese: クレジットロールを見よう
description.tchinese: 觀看制作人員名單。
description.schinese: 观看制作人员名单。

displayName.spanish: Lo que el viento se llevó

description.english: Dogfight and destroy 10 enemies in less than 5 minutes.
description.german: Zerstöre im Luftkampf 10 Feinde in weniger als 5 Minuten.
description.french: Abattez 10 appareils ennemis en moins de 5 minutes.
description.italian: Devi affrontare e distruggere 10 nemici in meno di 5 minuti.
description.spanish: Juega en «Combate aéreo» y destruye 10 enemigos en menos de 5 minutos.
description.russian: Сбейте в воздушном бою 10 противников за 5 минут или быстрее.
description.polish: Stocz walkę powietrzną i zestrzel 10 wrogów w mniej niż 5 minut.
description.czech: Znič v leteckém souboji 10 nepřátelských letadel za méně než 5 minut.
description.turkish: 5 dakika içerisinde 10 düşman uçağını it dalaşına girerek imha et.
description.brazilian: Destrua 10 aeronaves inimigas em uma dogfight em menos de 5 minutos.
description.japanese: ドッグファイトモードで5分以内に敵を十機撃ち落とせ
description.tchinese: 空戰不到5分鍾就擊毀10架敵機。
description.schinese: 空战不到5分钟就击毁10架敌机。

displayName.italian: La tigre volante e il dragone
displayName.japanese: フライングタイガー、ヒドゥンドラゴン

description.english: Eliminate three enemy aircraft at night.
description.german: Eliminiere drei feindliche Flugzeuge bei Nacht.
description.french: Abattez 3 appareils ennemis de nuit.
description.italian: Devi eliminare tre velivoli nemici di notte.
description.spanish: Elimina tres aviones enemigos por la noche.
description.russian: Сбейте трех врагов в воздушном бою ночью.
description.polish: Zniszcz przynajmniej 3 samoloty wroga nocą.
description.czech: Znič v nočním souboji alespoň tři nepřátelské letouny.
description.turkish: Gece üç düşman uçağını imha et.
description.brazilian: Destrua três aeronaves inimigas à noite.
description.japanese: 夜に敵の航空機を3機撃ち落とせ
description.tchinese: 晚上殲滅三架敵機。
description.schinese: 晚上歼灭三架敌机。

displayName.italian: Metà uomo, metà macchina, tutto tigre
displayName.czech: Napůl člověk, napůl stroj - celý tygr
displayName.turkish: Yarı İnsan, Yarı Makine - Tamamen Kaplan
displayName.brazilian: Meio Homem, Meio Máquina - Um Tigre Total

description.english: Achieve at least 50% machine gun accuracy in any campaign mission.
description.german: Erreiche mit den MGs eine Zielgenauigkeit von mindestens 50% in einer beliebigen Kampagnenmission.
description.french: Obtenez une précision aux mitrailleuses de 50 % ou plus dans une mission de la campagne.
description.italian: Devi ottenere almeno il 50% di precisione con la mitragliatrice in una missione di campagna.
description.spanish: Consigue al menos un 50% de precisión con las ametralladoras en cualquier misión de campaña.
description.russian: Добейтесь точности пулеметов в 50% или выше в любом задании кампании.
description.polish: Osiągnij przynajmniej 50% celności karabinami maszynowymi w dowolnej misji kampanii.
description.czech: V libovolné misi v kampani dosáhni 50% přesnosti střelby z kulometu.
description.turkish: Herhangi bir harekat görevinde makineli tüfek ile en az %50 isabet oranına ulaş.
description.brazilian: Obtenha pelo menos 50% de precisão com metralhadoras em qualquer missão da campanha.
description.japanese: キャンペーンのミッションで機関銃の命中精度を50%達成させよ
description.tchinese: 在任何戰鬥任務中達到至少50%的機槍射擊精度。
description.schinese: 在任何战斗任务中达到至少50%的机枪射击精度。

description.english: Sink all ships in the Torpedogs challenge.
description.german: Versenke alle Schiffe in der Herausforderung "Torpedogs".
description.french: Coulez tous les navires lors du défi Torpilles sous le Pacifique.
description.italian: Devi affondare tutte le navi nella sfida Fuori i siluri.
description.spanish: Hunde todos los barcos en el desafío «Torpedos sin piedad».
description.russian: Потопите все корабли в испытании «Торпедная атака».
description.polish: Zatop wszystkie okręty podczas wyzwania „Torpedziarze”.
description.czech: Potop všechny lodě ve výzvě Torpédoborec.
description.turkish: Torpido meydan okumasında tüm gemileri batır.
description.brazilian: Afunde todos os navios no desafio Torpedões.
description.japanese: 格闘戦でA6M2零戦でP-40を10機撃破せよ
description.tchinese: 在魚雷挑戰賽中擊沈所有艦船。
description.schinese: 在鱼雷挑战赛中击沉所有舰船。

displayName.spanish: El rojo sol saluda por la mañana
displayName.japanese: マッコウクジラを待て

description.english: Destroy 10 P-40s flying an A6M2 Zero-fighter.
description.german: Zerstöre 10 P-40 in einer A6M2 Zero.
description.french: Abattez 10 P-40 aux commandes d'un A6M2 Zero.
description.italian: Devi distruggere dieci P-40 pilotando un caccia A6M2 Zero.
description.spanish: Destruye 10 P-40 con un caza japonés A6M2 Zero.
description.russian: Сбейте 10 самолетов P-40, управляя истребителем A6M2 Zero.
description.polish: Zniszcz 10 P-40, pilotując myśliwiec A6M2 Zero.
description.czech: Znič 10 letounů P-40 ve stíhačce A6M2.
description.turkish: Bir A6M2 Zero-fighter ile 10 P-40'ı imha et.
description.brazilian: Destrua 10 P-40s voando em um caça A6M2 Zero
description.japanese: フィフィ島マップで着水し、マッコウクジラが現れるのを待て
description.tchinese: 駕駛日本A6M2零式戰鬥擊毀10架盟軍P-40戰鬥機。
description.schinese: 驾驶日本A6M2零式战斗击毁10架盟军P-40战斗机。

description.english: Land on water near the Phi Phi Islands and for wait sperm whales to appear.
description.german: Lande auf dem Wasser und warte, bis Pottwale auftauchen.
description.french: Amerrissez près des îles Phi Phi et attendez l'apparition des cachalots.
description.italian: Devi atterrare sull'acqua vicino alle Isole Phi Phi e attendere l'arrivo dei capodogli.
description.spanish: Aterriza en el agua cerca de las islas Phi Phi y espera a que aparezcan cachalotes.
description.russian: Совершите посадку на воду у островов Пхипхи и дождитесь появления кашалота.
description.polish: Wyląduj na wodzie obok wysp Phi Phi i poczekaj, aż pojawią się kaszaloty.
description.czech: Přistaň na vodě poblíž souostroví Phi Phi a počkej, dokud se neobjeví vorvani.
description.turkish: Phi Phi Adaları yakınında su üzerine iniş yap ve sperm balinaları görününceye kadar bekle.
description.brazilian: Pouse na água perto das ilhas Phi Phi e espere cachalotes aparecerem.
description.japanese: フィフィ島近くで着水し、イルカの群れが現れるのを待て
description.tchinese: 在皮皮島附近水上著陸，等待抹香鯨出現在飛機附近。
description.schinese: 在皮皮岛附近水上着陆，等待抹香鲸出现在飞机附近。

description.english: Land on water near the Phi Phi Islands and wait for dolphins to surface.
description.german: Lande auf dem Wasser und warte, bis Delfine auftauchen.
description.french: Amerrissez près des îles Phi Phi et attendez que les dauphins fassent surface.
description.italian: Devi atterrare sull'acqua vicino alle Isole Phi Phi e attendere l'arrivo dei delfini.
description.spanish: Aterriza en el agua cerca de las islas Phi Phi y espera a que aparezcan delfines.
description.russian: Совершите посадку на воду у островов Пхипхи и дождитесь появления дельфинов.
description.polish: Wyląduj na wodzie obok wysp Phi Phi i poczekaj, aż wynurzą się delfiny.
description.czech: Přistaň na vodě poblíž souostroví Phi Phi a počkej, dokud se neobjeví delfíni.
description.turkish: Phi Phi Adaları yakınında su üzerine iniş yap ve yunuslar görününceye kadar bekle.
description.brazilian: Pouse na água perto das ilhas Phi Phi e espere golfinhos aparecerem.
description.japanese: 夜のシュエダゴン・パゴダの前に着陸せよ
description.tchinese: 在皮皮島附近水上著陸，等待海豚躍出海面。
description.schinese: 在皮皮岛附近水上着陆，等待海豚跃出海面。

description.english: Land in front of the Schwedagon Pagoda at night.
description.german: Lande vor der Shwedagon-Pagode bei Nacht.
description.french: Posez-vous de nuit devant la pagode Shwedagon.
description.italian: Devi atterrare davanti alla pagoda Schwedagon di notte.
description.spanish: Aterriza enfrente de la pagoda de Schwedagon por la noche.
description.russian: Совершите посадку перед Пагодой Шведагон ночью.
description.polish: Wyląduj przed Pagodą Szwedagon nocą.
description.czech: Přistaň v noci před Šweitigoumskou pagodou.
description.turkish: Gece vakti Schwedagon Pagodası'nın önüne iniş yap.
description.brazilian: Pouse em frente ao pagode de Shwedagon à noite.
description.japanese: チェレンジモードの虎の眼で4分以内に旗を全て奪取せよ
description.tchinese: 晚間在仰光雪德宮大金塔前著陸。
description.schinese: 晚间在仰光雪德宫大金塔前着陆。

displayName.japanese: サムライ・ショウダウン

description.english: Grab all flags in the Eye of the Tiger challenge in less than 4 minutes.
description.german: Schnapp dir alle Flaggen in der Herausforderung "Auge des Tigers" in unter 4 Minuten.
description.french: Récupérez tous les drapeaux du défi L'œil du tigre en moins de 4 minutes.
description.italian: Devi conquistare tutte le bandiere nella sfida Occhio della tigre in meno di 4 minuti.
description.spanish: Consigue todas las banderas en el desafío «El ojo del tigre» en menos de 4 minutos.
description.schinese: 虎眼挑战赛中，在4分钟以内夺取所有旗帜。
description.tchinese: 虎眼挑戰賽中，在4分鍾以內奪取所有旗幟。
description.russian: Соберите все флаги в испытании «Глаз тигра» за 4 минуты или быстрее.
description.japanese: チャレンジモードのサムライ・ショウダウンで15分間生き延びろ
description.polish: Zdobądź wszystkie flagi podczas wyzwania „Oko tygrysa” w mniej niż 4 minuty.
description.czech: Seber všechny vlajky ve výzvě Oko tygra za méně než 4 minuty.
description.turkish: Kaplanın Gözü meydan okumasında 4 dakika içerisinde tüm bayrakları kap.
description.brazilian: Pegue todas as bandeiras no desafio Olho dos Tigres em menos de 4 minutos.

displayName.japanese: ロケットライトニング

description.english: Survive 15 minutes in the Samurai Showdown challenge.
description.german: Überlebe 15 Minuten in der Herausforderung "Samurai-Showdown".
description.french: Survivez pendant 15 minutes dans le défi La charge du samouraï.
description.italian: Devi sopravvivere 15 minuti in La sfida dei samurai.
description.spanish: Sobrevive 15 minutos en el desafío «Enfrentamiento de samuráis».
description.schinese: 在日本武士最后决战中存活15分钟。
description.tchinese: 在日本武士終極之戰中存活15分鍾。
description.russian: Продержитесь 15 минут в испытании «Путь самурая».
description.japanese: チャレンジモードのロケットライトニングで機関銃を発砲せずに勝利せよ
description.polish: Przetrwaj 15 minut podczas wyzwania „Bitwa z samurajem”.
description.czech: Přežij 15 minut ve výzvě Souboj samurajů.
description.turkish: Samuray Gösterisi meydan okumasında 15 dakika hayatta kal.
description.brazilian: Sobreviva 15 minutos no desafio Duelo Samurai.

description.english: Complete the Rocket Lightning challenge without using machineguns.
description.german: Schließe die Herausforderung "Raketen-Lightning" ohne den Einsatz von MGs ab.
description.french: Réussissez le défi Comme la foudre sans utiliser vos mitrailleuses.
description.italian: Devi completare la sfida Razzi e fulmini senza usare mitragliatrici.
description.spanish: Completa el desafío «Relámpagos de misiles» sin usar ametralladoras.
description.schinese: 不用机枪，完成火箭闪电挑战赛。
description.tchinese: 不用機槍，完成火箭閃電挑戰賽。
description.russian: Завершите испытание «Ракетная "Молния"», не используя пулеметы.
description.japanese: チャレンジモードの魚雷ミッションで敵船舶をすべて沈めよ
description.polish: Ukończ wyzwanie „Rakietowy piorun”, nie używając karabinów maszynowych.
description.czech: Dokonči výzvu Rakeťák bez použití samopalů.
description.turkish: Roketli Lightning meydan okumasını makineli tüfek kullanmadan tamamla.
description.brazilian: Conclua o desafio Foguete Relâmpago sem usar metralhadoras.

description.english: Bomb all targets in the Ground Attack challenge with an accuracy of at least 50%.
description.german: Bombardiere alle Ziele in der Herausforderung "Bodenangriff" mit mindestens 50% Zielgenauigkeit.
description.french: Bombardez les cibles avec une efficacité d'au moins 50 % dans le défi Attaque au sol.
description.italian: Devi bombardare tutti i bersagli nella sfida Attacco a terra con una precisione minima del 50%.
description.spanish: Bombardea todos los objetivos en el desafío «Ataque terrestre» con una precisión de al menos el 50%.
description.schinese: 在地面攻击挑战赛中以50%以上的精度击中所有目标。
description.tchinese: 在地面攻擊挑戰賽中以50%以上的精度擊中所有目標。
description.russian: Разбомбите все цели в испытании «Штурмовка» с точностью не ниже 50%.
description.japanese: チャレンジモードの地上攻撃ミッションで爆弾を50%以上の精度で命中させよ
description.polish: Zbombarduj wszystkie cele podczas wyzwania „Atak naziemny”, osiągając celność przynajmniej 50%.
description.czech: Vybombarduj všechny cíle ve výzvě Pozemní útok s přesností minimálně 50 %.
description.turkish: En az %50 isabet oranıyla Yer Taaruzu meydan okumasındaki tüm hedefleri imha et.
description.brazilian: Bombardeie todos os alvos no desafio Ataque Terrestre com uma precisão de pelo menos 50%.

description.english: Sink a Japanese destroyer during the Invasion of Malaya mission.
description.german: Versenke einen japanischen Zerstörer in der Mission "Invasion von Malaysia".
description.french: Coulez un destroyer japonais durant la mission L'invasion de la Malaisie.
description.italian: Devi affondare un cacciatorpediniere giapponese durante la missione Invasione della Malesia.
description.spanish: Hunde un destructor japonés en la misión «Invasión de Malaya».
description.schinese: 在入侵马来亚的任务中击沉日本驱逐舰。
description.tchinese: 在入侵馬來亞的任務中擊沈日本驅逐艦。
description.russian: Потопите японский эсминец в задании «Вторжение в Малайю».
description.japanese: 日本軍の駆逐艦をマラヤ侵攻で撃沈せよ
description.polish: Zatop japoński niszczyciel podczas misji „Inwazja na Malaje”.
description.czech: Potop japonský torpédoborec v misi Invaze do Malajska.
description.turkish: Malaya'nın İşgali görevinde bir Japon destroyerini batır.
description.brazilian: Afunde um destroier japonês durante a missão Invasão da Malásia.
